description: A pet washing station is rare. Only 7% of buildings in Orlando have this feature. All-inclusive legendary club amenitiesSpectacular sun-drenched poolHigh-tech athletic health club. Modern living on Millenia. Whether you are looking to relax or get your heart racing, The Addison on Millenia offers a collection of resort-inspired amenities you have been longing for. Nothing is common. Nothing is routine. Nothing is overlooked. It is your time to live the good life you deserve. The Addison on Millenia is a place where you can take time to reflect, relax & cool down in our spectacular sun-drenched pool; enjoy time with your friends, whether it is outdoor fireside overlooking spectacular Lake Millenia or unwind inside one of our all-inclusive legendary club amenities. If being energized is what you are looking for, just outside your door is a high-tech athletic health club sure to get your pulse up and leave you feeling exceptional. The Addison on Millenia is brilliantly designed to make you feel at home.
